title: Motion pictures. 1st 20 years. Part 4 [No. 1]: 1905
brief_description:
A compilation of early silent motion pictures produced by Thomas A. Edison, photography by Edwin S. Porter.
Contents: The Seven ages (1905)—How Jones lost his roll (1905)—Do you know the family (1905)
